00010 Sound = {
00011   tracks: {},
00012   _enabled: true,
00013   template:
00014     new Template('<embed style="height:0" id="sound_#{track}_#{id}" src="#{url}" loop="false" autostart="true" hidden="true"/>'),
00015   enable: function(){
00016     Sound._enabled = true;
00017   },
00018   disable: function(){
00019     Sound._enabled = false;
00020   },
00021   play: function(url){
00022     if(!Sound._enabled) return;
00023     var options = Object.extend({
00024       track: 'global', url: url, replace: false
00025     }, arguments[1] || {});
00026     
00027     if(options.replace && this.tracks[options.track]) {
00028       $R(0, this.tracks[options.track].id).each(function(id){
00029         var sound = $('sound_'+options.track+'_'+id);
00030         sound.Stop && sound.Stop();
00031         sound.remove();
00032       })
00033       this.tracks[options.track] = null;
00034     }
00035       
00036     if(!this.tracks[options.track])
00037       this.tracks[options.track] = { id: 0 }
00038     else
00039       this.tracks[options.track].id++;
00040       
00041     options.id = this.tracks[options.track].id;
00042     $$('body')[0].insert( 
00043       Prototype.Browser.IE ? new Element('bgsound',{
00044         id: 'sound_'+options.track+'_'+options.id,
00045         src: options.url, loop: 1, autostart: true
00046       }) : Sound.template.evaluate(options));
00047   }
00048 };
00049 
00050 if(Prototype.Browser.Gecko && navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Win") > 0){
00051   if(navigator.plugins && $A(navigator.plugins).detect(function(p){ return p.name.indexOf('QuickTime') != -1 }))
00052     Sound.template = new Template('<object id="sound_#{track}_#{id}" width="0" height="0" type="audio/mpeg" data="#{url}"/>')
00053   else
00054     Sound.play = function(){}
00055 }
